name: area-chart-story
title: Area Chart Story
author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>
description: Interactive Storybook stories demonstrating area chart variants including stacked, gradient, icons, and interactive examples

files.content:

color: "var(--chart-2)", }, } satisfies ChartConfig; export function ChartAreaInteractive() { const [timeRange, setTimeRange] = React.useState("90d"); const filteredData = chartData.filter((item) => { const date = new Date(item.date); const referenceDate = new Date("2024-06-30"); let daysToSubtract = 90; if (timeRange === "30d") { daysToSubtract = 30; } else if (timeRange === "7d") { daysToSubtract = 7; } const startDate = new Date(referenceDate); startDate.setDate(startDate.getDate() - daysToSubtract); return date >= startDate; }); return (
